author: Dana Howl
description:
Head to https://squarespace.com/danahowl to save 10% off your first purchase of a website or domain using code DANAHOWL

In this video I explain to you my three principles of brush control, the absolute fundamentals of how to wield a brush when painting miniatures

My Website: https://howlcorp.com
Support Me on PATREON: https://patreon.com/danahowl

title: 3 Principles to Learn: A Beginner's Guide to Brush Control
